title: question to Riot staff about the boards
body:
I noticed that there are a lot more supported boards on NA, is this due to less people being active on OCE?
I'm not sure if that's it or if it's for some other reason but on the forums we seemed to do fine with some similar categories..

also a suggestion (now that I think about it):
I think you should add the option to "tag" posts, so users can keep track of posts they might express an interest in rather than sifting through them.

and by that I mean you just pin it up in a list rather than applying #tagslikethese if that makes sense..

replies.body:
Hey Crusader Charlie!

Happy to hear your suggestions if you think we are missing some sub boards that would be popular. Also I will investigate that tagging feature you talked about it sounds like it would be useful.
We don't have much people on Boards on OCE.

yeah I guess, can't help but feel a little left out in a way, but then on the other hand I spend more time playing than posting so it doesn't really effect me.
I think they did a really nice job on the boards though, looks pretty snazzy
